name: Day8_HomeWork
description: /*     Create your own Microservices-based-app     --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ?     You are working in the Netflix engineering team.     You goal is to implement the new Microservice structure to load and stream the videos back to the user. ?     The system should have:     - A load balancing service, that will be the endpoint receiving the requests     - N instances of a microservice that store and retrieve from the CDN the files ?     Notes:     - The system should be able to work with an arbitray number of microservices     - The system should exclude non-working microservices     - All the files should be stored in Cloudinary or Azure Storage
